mapper.sql: SELECT TRIP_CONTENTID , TRIP_ADDRESS || TRIP_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS TRIP_ADDRESS , TRIP_TITLE , (SELECT S.AREA_NAME FROM AREA S WHERE S.AREA_CODE = AREACODE AND S.SIGUNGU_CODE = 0) AS AREACODE , (SELECT S.AREA_NAME FROM AREA S WHERE S.AREA_CODE = AREACODE AND S.SIGUNGU_CODE = SIGUNGUCODE) AS SIGUNGUCODE , (SELECT S.BIG_CATE_NAME FROM BIGCATEGORY S WHERE S.BIG_CATE_CODE = TRIP_CATEGORY1 )AS TRIP_CATEGORY1 , (SELECT S.MID_CATE_NAME FROM MIDCATEGORY S WHERE S.MID_CATE_CODE = TRIP_CATEGORY2 )AS TRIP_CATEGORY2 , (SELECT S.SML_CATE_NAME FROM SMLCATEGORY S WHERE S.SML_CATE_CODE = TRIP_CATEGORY3 )AS TRIP_CATEGORY3 , CASE TRIP_CONTENTTYPEID WHEN 12 THEN '관광지' WHEN 14 THEN '문화시설' WHEN 15 THEN '축제공연행사' WHEN 25 THEN '여행코스' WHEN 28 THEN '레포츠' WHEN 32 THEN '숙박' WHEN 38 THEN '쇼핑' WHEN 39 THEN '음식점' END AS TRIP_CONTENTTYPEID , NVL(TRIP_IMAGE, '-') AS TRIP_IMAGE , NVL(TRIP_TEL, '-') AS TRIP_TEL , NVL(HOMEPAGE, '-') AS HOMEPAGE , NVL(OVERVIEW, '-') AS OVERVIEW FROM TRIP

SELECT STAY_CONTENTID, STAY_ADDRESS || STAY_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS "STAY_ADDRESS", STAY_TITLE, (SELECT S.AREA_NAME FROM AREA S WHERE S.AREA_CODE = AREACODE AND S.SIGUNGU_CODE = 0) AS AREACODE, (SELECT S.AREA_NAME FROM AREA S WHERE S.AREA_CODE = AREACODE AND S.SIGUNGU_CODE = SIGUNGUCODE) AS SIGUNGUCODE, (SELECT S.BIG_CATE_NAME FROM BIGCATEGORY S WHERE S.BIG_CATE_CODE = STAY_CATEGORY1 )AS STAY_CATEGORY1, (SELECT S.MID_CATE_NAME FROM MIDCATEGORY S WHERE S.MID_CATE_CODE = STAY_CATEGORY2 )AS STAY_CATEGORY2, (SELECT S.SML_CATE_NAME FROM SMLCATEGORY S WHERE S.SML_CATE_CODE = STAY_CATEGORY3 )AS STAY_CATEGORY3, NVL(STAY_IMAGE, '-') AS STAY_IMAGE, NVL(STAY_TEL, '-') AS STAY_TEL, NVL(HOMEPAGE, '-') AS HOMEPAGE, NVL(OVERVIEW, '-') AS OVERVIEW FROM STAY
SELECT PETINFO_CONTENTID , TOUR_INFO , ACMPY_TYPE_CD , RELA_POSES_FCLTY , RELA_FRNSH_PRDLST , RELA_PURC_PRDLST , RELA_RNTL_PRDLST , ACMPY_PSBL_CPAM , ETC_ACMPY_INFO , ACMPY_NEED_MTR FROM PETINFO
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRIP
AND AREACODE = #{selectArea}
AND (TRIP_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR TRIP_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} ||'%')
ORDER BY TRIP_TITLE

SELECT T.TRIP_CONTENTID, T.TRIP_ADDRESS || T.TRIP_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS TRIP_ADDRESS, T.TRIP_TITLE, NVL(T.TRIP_IMAGE, '-') AS TRIP_IMAGE, NVL(T.TRIP_TEL, '별도 문의') AS TRIP_TEL, NVL(T.HOMEPAGE, '-') AS HOMEPAGE, NVL(T.OVERVIEW, '-') AS OVERVIEW, NVL(P.RELA_POSES_FCLTY, '-') AS P_RELA_POSES_FCLTY, NVL(P.ETC_ACMPY_INFO, '-') AS P_ETC_ACMPY_INFO, NVL(P.RELA_RNTL_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_RNTL_PRDLST, NVL(P.RELA_PURC_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_PURC_PRDLST, NVL(P.RELA_FRNSH_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_FRNSH_PRDLST, NVL(P.ACMPY_PSBL_CPAM, '동반 동물 별도 제한 없음') AS P_ACMPY_PSBL_CPAM, NVL(P.ACMPY_NEED_MTR, '-') AS P_ACMPY_NEED_MTR FROM TRIP T INNER JOIN PETINFO P ON (T.TRIP_CONTENTID = P.PETINFO_CONTENTID) WHERE T.TRIP_CONTENTID = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STAY
AND AREACODE = #{selectArea}
AND (STAY_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} ||'%' OR STAY_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} ||'%')
ORDER BY STAY_TITLE

SELECT S.STAY_CONTENTID, S.STAY_ADDRESS || STAY_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS STAY_ADDRESS, S.STAY_TITLE AS STAY_TITLE, NVL(S.STAY_IMAGE, '-') AS STAY_IMAGE, NVL(S.STAY_TEL, '별도 문의') AS STAY_TEL, NVL(S.HOMEPAGE, '-') AS HOMEPAGE, NVL(S.OVERVIEW, '-') AS OVERVIEW, NVL(P.RELA_POSES_FCLTY, '-') AS P_RELA_POSES_FCLTY, NVL(P.ETC_ACMPY_INFO, '-') AS P_ETC_ACMPY_INFO, NVL(P.RELA_RNTL_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_RNTL_PRDLST, NVL(P.RELA_PURC_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_PURC_PRDLST, NVL(P.RELA_FRNSH_PRDLST, '없음') AS P_RELA_FRNSH_PRDLST, NVL(P.ACMPY_PSBL_CPAM, '동반 동물 별도 제한 없음') AS P_ACMPY_PSBL_CPAM, NVL(P.ACMPY_NEED_MTR, '-') AS P_ACMPY_NEED_MTR FROM STAY S INNER JOIN PETINFO P ON (S.STAY_CONTENTID = P.PETINFO_CONTENTID) WHERE S.STAY_CONTENTID = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT STAY_CONTENTID AS CONTENTID , STAY_ADDRESS AS ADDRESS , STAY_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS DETAIL_ADDRESS , STAY_TITLE AS TITLE , STAY_CONTENTTYPEID AS CONTENTTYPE , STAY_IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM STAY UNION SELECT TRIP_CONTENTID AS CONTENTID , TRIP_ADDRESS AS ADDRESS , TRIP_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS DETAIL_ADDRESS , TRIP_TITLE AS TITLE , TRIP_CONTENTTYPEID AS CONTENTTYPE , TRIP_IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM TRIP ) WHERE CONTENTID IN (SELECT CONTENTID FROM ZZIM WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})

SELECT CONTENTID , ADDRESS || NVL(DETAIL_ADDRESS, '') AS ADDRESS , TITLE , DECODE(CONTENTTYPE , '12', '관광지', '32', '숙소') AS CONTENTTYPE , IMAGE FROM ( SELECT STAY_CONTENTID AS CONTENTID , STAY_ADDRESS AS ADDRESS , STAY_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS DETAIL_ADDRESS , STAY_TITLE AS TITLE , STAY_CONTENTTYPEID AS CONTENTTYPE , STAY_IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM STAY UNION SELECT TRIP_CONTENTID AS CONTENTID , TRIP_ADDRESS AS ADDRESS , TRIP_DETAIL_ADDRESS AS DETAIL_ADDRESS , TRIP_TITLE AS TITLE , TRIP_CONTENTTYPEID AS CONTENTTYPE , TRIP_IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM TRIP ) WHERE CONTENTID IN (SELECT CONTENTID FROM ZZIM WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZZIM ( CONTENTID, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{memberNo} )
